text: @realDonaldTrump You set up guidelines for reopening our country.  Are you saying we shouldn't follow your guidelines?  My husband was exposed to COVID-19 by a co-worker.  The aircraft repair shop he works for is now closed for two weeks.  This on top of a 10% cut in pay because no one if flying.
